name: xcf-commands
description: WordPress Command Palette for Custom Post Types

scripts.playground: cross-env-shell wp-playground-cli server --verbosity debug --experimental-devtools --experimental-multi-worker --blueprint blueprint/blueprint.json --mount-dir blueprint /wordpress/blueprint --auto-mount
scripts.pack: npm run build && zip -r xcf-commands.zip build/ src/ xcf-commands.* readme.txt demo.gif languages/
